translator_notes: Page 4 contains book recommendations from the publisher
Sarah Lacy's book 'Once You're Lucky, Twice You're Good' (2008) - the Russian title is a loose translation
Maxim Kotin's 'И ботаники делают бизнес' (2011) is about Fedya Ovchinnikov and Dodo Pizza - a popular Russian business story
The term 'ботаники' (nerds/geeks) appears again, connecting to the book's theme of intellectual outsiders succeeding in business
Mann, Ivanov, Ferber (MIF) is known for publishing translated and original business/entrepreneurship books
